mapper.update: update UO_OP_DAILY_HEADER set status = #{status},version=version+1 where head_id = #{headId} and version=#{version}
update UO_OP_DAILY_HEADER set OPT_NUM = #{num} where head_id = #{headId}
mapper.select: SELECT HEAD_ID, TOUCH_DT,to_char(TOUCH_DT, 'yyyymmdd') TOUCH_DT_STR, TOTAL_NUM, SUCCESS_NUM,CONVERT_NUM, CONVERT_RATE, CONVERT_AMOUNT, STATUS,VERSION,EFFECT_DAYS FROM UO_OP_DAILY_HEADER WHERE HEAD_ID = #{headId}

select count(1) from ( SELECT t1.GROUP_ID, t1.IS_COUPON, t1.SMS_CODE, t2.SMS_CONTENT, LISTAGG(t4.coupon_name, ',') within group (order by t4.coupon_id) coupon_name FROM UO_OP_DAILY_TEMPLATE_CONFIG t1, UO_OP_SMS_TEMPLATE t2, UO_OP_DAILY_GROUP_COUPON t3, UO_OP_COUPON t4 where t1.SMS_CODE = t2.SMS_CODE(+) and t1.group_id = t3.group_id(+) and t3.coupon_id = t4.coupon_id(+) group by t1.GROUP_ID, t1.IS_COUPON, t1.SMS_CODE, t2.SMS_CONTENT ) where (IS_COUPON = 1 and coupon_name is null) or (IS_COUPON = 0 and coupon_name is not null) or SMS_CONTENT is null
select TOTAL_NUM, SUCCESS_NUM,CONVERT_NUM, CONVERT_RATE, CONVERT_AMOUNT, CONVERT_SPU_NUM, CONVERT_SPU_RATE, CONVERT_SPU_AMOUNT from UO_OP_DAILY_HEADER where HEAD_ID = #{id} and status <> 'todo'

select CONVERT_SPU_RATE, CONVERT_RATE, CONVERT_SPU_NUM, CONVERT_NUM, to_char(CONVERSION_DATE, 'yyyymmdd') CONVERSION_DATE_STR from UO_OP_DAILY_STATIS where HEAD_ID = #{headId} order by CONVERSION_DATE asc
mapper.update:
update UO_OP_DAILY_HEADER
push_method=#{pushMethod},
push_period=#{pushPeriod},
EFFECT_DAYS=#{effectDays},
where head_id = #{headId}
mapper.select: SELECT v2.VALUE growth_type, ucnt FROM ( SELECT growth_type, COUNT ( * ) ucnt FROM uo_op_daily_detail WHERE head_id = #{headId} GROUP BY growth_type ) v1 RIGHT JOIN ( SELECT CODE, VALUE, ORDER_NO FROM T_DICT WHERE TYPE_CODE = 'GROWTH_TYPE' ) v2 ON v2.code = v1.growth_type ORDER BY v2.order_no desc

SELECT v2.VALUE growth_series_type, ucnt FROM ( SELECT growth_series_type, COUNT ( * ) ucnt FROM uo_op_daily_detail WHERE head_id =#{headId} GROUP BY growth_series_type ) v1 RIGHT JOIN ( SELECT CODE, VALUE, ORDER_NO FROM T_DICT WHERE TYPE_CODE = 'GROWTH_SERIES_TYPE' ) v2 ON v2.code = v1.growth_series_type ORDER BY v2.order_no desc

SELECT v2.code user_value, v2.VALUE user_value_label, ucnt FROM ( SELECT user_value, COUNT ( * ) ucnt FROM uo_op_daily_detail WHERE head_id = #{headId} GROUP BY user_value ) v1 RIGHT JOIN ( SELECT CODE, VALUE, ORDER_NO FROM T_DICT WHERE TYPE_CODE = 'USER_VALUE' ) v2 ON v2.code = v1.user_value ORDER BY v2.order_no desc
select path_active,lifecycle,count(*) ucnt from uo_op_daily_detail where head_id =#{headId} and user_value=#{userValue} group by path_active,lifecycle
select STATUS from UO_OP_DAILY_HEADER where to_char(TOUCH_DT, 'yyyymmdd') = to_char(sysdate, 'yyyymmdd') select STATUS from UO_OP_DAILY_HEADER where TOUCH_DT::date = current_date
select IS_COUPON, SMS_CODE from UO_OP_DAILY_TEMPLATE_CONFIG where GROUP_ID = #{groupId}::int4
select count(1) from UO_OP_SMS_TEMPLATE where (IS_COUPON_NAME = #{isCoupon} or IS_COUPON_URL = #{isCoupon}) and sms_code = #{smsCode}

select count(1) from UO_OP_DAILY_HEADER where to_char(TOUCH_DT, 'yyyymmdd') = to_char(sysdate, 'yyyymmdd') and STATUS = 'todo' select count(1) from UO_OP_DAILY_HEADER where TOUCH_DT::date = current_date and STATUS = 'todo'
mapper.update: update uo_op_daily_header h set status='timeout' where h.status='todo' and touch_dt::date!=current_date
mapper.select: select uo_op_daily_template_config.lifecycle from uo_op_daily_detail left join uo_op_daily_template_config on uo_op_daily_detail.group_id = uo_op_daily_template_config.group_id where user_id = #{userId} and head_id = #{headId}::integer
